org.springframework.batch.item.file.builder

Class FlatFileItemReaderBuilder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.batch.item.file.builder.FlatFileItemReaderBuilder<T>

  • public class FlatFileItemReaderBuilder<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder implementation for the FlatFileItemReader.
    Since:
    4.0
    Author:
    Michael Minella
    See Also:
    FlatFileItemReader

      • delimited

        public FlatFileItemReaderBuilder.DelimitedBuilder<T> delimited()
        Returns an instance of a FlatFileItemReaderBuilder.DelimitedBuilder for building a DelimitedLineTokenizer. The DelimitedLineTokenizer configured by this builder will only be used if one is not explicitly configured via lineTokenizer
        Returns:
        a FlatFileItemReaderBuilder.DelimitedBuilder

      • fixedLength

        public FlatFileItemReaderBuilder.FixedLengthBuilder<T> fixedLength()
        Returns an instance of a FlatFileItemReaderBuilder.FixedLengthBuilder for building a FixedLengthTokenizer. The FixedLengthTokenizer configured by this builder will only be used if the lineTokenizer has not been configured.
        Returns:
        a FlatFileItemReaderBuilder.FixedLengthBuilder

      • targetType

        public FlatFileItemReaderBuilder<T> targetType(java.lang.Class<? extends T> targetType)
        The class that will represent the "item" to be returned from the reader. This class is used via the BeanWrapperFieldSetMapper. If more complex logic is required, providing your own FieldSetMapper via fieldSetMapper is required.
        Parameters:
        targetType - The class to map to
        Returns:
        The current instance of the builder.
        See Also:
        BeanWrapperFieldSetMapper.setTargetType(Class)

      • prototypeBeanName

        public FlatFileItemReaderBuilder<T> prototypeBeanName(java.lang.String prototypeBeanName)

        Parameters:
        prototypeBeanName - the name of a prototype scoped bean
        Returns:
        The current instance of the builder.
        See Also:

        beanMapperStrict - defaults to false
        Returns:
        The current instance of the builder.

        public FlatFileItemReaderBuilder<T> saveState(boolean saveState)
        Configure if the state of the FlatFileItemReader should be persisted within the ExecutionContext for restart purposes.
        Parameters:
        saveState - defaults to true
        Returns:
        The current instance of the builder.
        See Also:
        AbstractItemCountingItemStreamItemReader.setSaveState(boolean)

      • name

        public FlatFileItemReaderBuilder<T> name(java.lang.String name)
        The name used to calculate the key within the ExecutionContext. Required if saveState(boolean) is set to true.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the reader instance
        Returns:
        The current instance of the builder.
        See Also:
        ItemStreamSupport.setName(String)
